title: New buffs location is quite annoying.
body: I don't really like this new locaiton for the buffs, it can get in the chat and the one for items is a bit wierd too.

replies.body:
If I'm correct, you can actually move your chatbox to wherever you want it to be.

Try hovering your mouse over the chat and see if you get a translucent window. Drag it like a normal window and see what happens.
Yep you are correct, I knew that but I got used to the chat being down there. xD And I liked the central position of the buffs, it was eastier to hover over them and see what they are! :D

Yeah I would have expected the buffs to fill up the line above the champion HUD first before creating another layer. 

If you really don't want to change locations, have fun lol
I think it is set up Left half = Buff right half = debuff. could be wrong though ^_^
